texts.app_stext: :blue[**Assistance in preparing lessons with Mr. Human, a real teacher, not one of those darn synthetic craps.**]
texts.app_shelp: *Usage: The buttons Exercises, Workshops, Revision, Homework, and Quiz will generate results directly related to the last lesson created with the same parameters, if you have previously generated this lesson.*
texts.app_lthlp: When he doesn't know something, Mr. Human may occasionally ask a friend. Choose which one:

prompts.subject: on a topic of your choice related to the following school subject: [{t_subject}]. Indicate in the title the subject and the topic you have chosen within this subject.
prompts.public: Adapt the level for students aged {t_age} years.
prompts.appropriate: Start your response with a short paragraph titled 'Relevance of the topic' in which you state whether you consider this topic appropriate or too advanced to begin teaching students of this age. Add a hline after this paragraph to separate it from the rest.
prompts.solution: At the end of your response, insert a horizontal line and then a bold title 'Answers for the teacher', listing the correct answers.
prompts.remediation: Conclude by adding a paragraph titled 'Remediation' where you will describe alternative explanations to help students who may not understand certain parts explained in this course.
prompts.country: The text must be written taking into account the linguistic and cultural specificities of the following country: {t_country}.
